# 단계별 실버 문제 선별
>1. [피보나치 수 5](https://www.acmicpc.net/problem/10870) 
###
나의 풀이
```
import java.awt.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());
        BufferedWriter bufferedWriter = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));
        int n = Integer.valueOf(st.nextToken());

        int number1 = 0;
        int number2 = 1;
        int result = 0;
        int tempnumber = 0;
        if(n>2) {
            for(int i=0; i<n-1; i++){
                result = number1 + number2;
                tempnumber = number2;
                number2 = result;
                number1 = tempnumber;
            }
        } else if(n == 0) {
            result = 0;
        } else {
            result = 1;
        }

        bufferedWriter.write(String.valueOf(result));
        br.close();
        bufferedWriter.close();

    }
}
```
>2. [소수 찾기](https://www.acmicpc.net/problem/1978) 
###
나의 풀이
```
import java.awt.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {

        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());
        BufferedWriter bufferedWriter = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));

        int n = Integer.valueOf(st.nextToken());

        boolean[] number= new boolean[1001];
        number[0] = false;
        number[1] = false;

        for (int i=2; i<=1000; i++) {
            number[i] = true;
        }

        //소수가 아니면 false
        for (int i=2  ; i<=1000; i++) {
            if(number[i] == true) {
                for (int j= i*2 ; j <=1000; j += i){
                    number[j] = false;
                }
            }
        }

        int count = 0;
        st = new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());
        for (int i=0; i <n; i++) {
            int numberFind = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
            if (number[numberFind]==true) {
                System.out.println(numberFind);
                count++;
            }
        }


        bufferedWriter.write(String.valueOf(count));
        br.close();
        bufferedWriter.close();

    }
}
```
